subject: Recording of movement of all types of vehicles
text: 9afly 7c4 VTNf gelarut Phone 91-11-25074100/25074 Fax 91-11-25093507/25093 (a86 4a6t 3 <hTT HET4) Extn 2223/2318/2468/2: National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport & Highways) 6G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110045 NHAI/13013/3/03-04/CMD-COfPolicy on Toll 11 Nov 2003 CIRCULAR NO: NIAICOMMERCIAL OPERATION /33 SUB: RECORDING OF MOVEMENT OF ALL TYPE OF VEHICLES It has been observed that most of the PIUs/ CMUs engaged in collection of fee are not ensuring to record movement of all types of vehicles crossing the toll plazas: e.g: subsequent movement of vehicles already having multiple journey ticket or monthly pass or claiming exemption, are not being recorded Requisite changes in the software "TOLL MAN" have already been carried out t0 capture such details. The practice of capturing such details manually by entering the data in a register should also be immediately replaced by capturing such details in the computers wherever already installed Otherwise, such data could be recorded manually in a register. In case, extreme lanes being used for such movements do not have computers/ booths, necessary action be initiated for procurement of the same in consultation with concerred division (e.g. IT Division for  computers, CM Division for booths) at HO This would also enable  proper reconciliation with the figures of vehicles reported by Independent Toll Audit Equipments already installed/ to be installed Please ensure strict compliance: This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority: K= (At Honia) General Manager (CO) To: All PIUs/ CMUs submitted for favour of information to: All Members/ CGMs] CVO/ CPD All GMs PS to Chairman Chief Engineer (PIC), MoRT&H Internal Auditor M779 ENHAL Copy
